forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny. High 18C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and a few clouds. High near 65F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Low 11C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 53F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High near 15C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 59F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 9C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 49F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High near 15C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High around 60F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 12C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low around 55F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 53F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High around 15C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 60F. SE winds shifting to WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy early with showers developing later in the day. High near 60F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 47F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 61F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low around 10C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
